name: Clash of Digital: Rumble Smash - Demo
name_original: Clash of Digital: Rumble Smash - Demo
description:
Under development game

Genre : Action, Platformer, Fighting, Rumble battle, Indie game
Platform : Windows PC (Steam)

Clash of Digital : Rumble Smash is platformer rumble battle game. Franchise game from `Clash of Digital` title. A digital clashing rumble battle between character based on their skill and techniques to see who is the strongest . There are various kinds of playable characters, each one has their own skill and techniques. Different items with various kind of power that can helpful be for player. Win a tournament battle program for unlock each new characters.

Key features :

* Unlockable character and map
* Tournament battle program
* Arcade battle program
* 4 local multiplayer battle

Demo content :

4 local multiplayer battle with 4 character only. There are 4 playable character in the beginning. Ryu, Excel, Destiny and Antivi.
